name: event-sourced-patience-backend
description: AWS Serverless backend for event-sourced Patience demonstration
author: Ben New <ben@leftclick.com.au>

scripts.setup: if ! aws s3 ls s3://${npm_package_config_service}-deployment; then aws s3 mb s3://${npm_package_config_service}-deployment; fi
scripts.build: npm run setup && npm run compile && npm run package
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file build/template.yaml --region ap-southeast-2 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --stack-name ${npm_package_config_service}-${npm_config_stage:-${npm_package_config_default_stage}} --parameter-overrides Stage=${npm_config_stage:-${npm_package_config_default_stage}} DeploymentId=`date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S`
scripts.push: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.pull: npm run delete && npm run clean
